channel.title: CVE Feed for Silicon Labs -- Gecko Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Silicon Labs -- Gecko Platform

item.title: CVE-2023-28379|2023-11-14T18:00:06.109Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server form boundary functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-28391|2023-11-14T18:00:07.577Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server header parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. Specially crafted network packets can lead to code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-39540|2024-02-20T18:00:11.007Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the ICMP and ICMPv6 parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-TCP-IP v3.06.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to an out-of-bounds read. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability concerns a denial of service within the parsing an IPv4 ICMP packet.

item.title: CVE-2023-39541|2024-02-20T18:00:11.171Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the ICMP and ICMPv6 parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-TCP-IP v3.06.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to an out-of-bounds read. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability concerns a denial of service within the parsing an IPv6 ICMPv6 packet.

item.title: CVE-2023-27882|2023-11-14T18:00:07.947Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server form boundary functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-24585|2023-11-14T18:00:07.178Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to memory corruption. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-45318|2024-02-20T18:00:06.767Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP git commit 80d4004. A specially crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-31247|2023-11-14T09:14:51.588Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server Host header parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-25181|2023-11-14T18:00:06.813Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. A specially crafted set of network packets can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.
